text: That sounds good, it's nice how you still have time to chill even though sometimes work can be intense, has there been a time where you haven't really had time to chill?

When you finished uni, were you just applying for jobs with your showreel or your final project if you had one? Was using LinkedIn for example help out to find a job? At the moment Jon hunting is my main concern coz I don't exactly know how to find VFX job roles unless I look at places like LinkedIn or indeed or even specific company websites, did you know a company you were interested in joining before you graduated?

It's quite cool how you wanted to be a mentor to help out with people who was in the same situation in the past, every little helps and I am grateful that you can at least reply to me so thank you kindly it really helps even though I'm just bombarding you with questions haha maybe I could buy you a drink sometime?
